name: Crystalline Monolith
description: The Crystalline Monolith resembles a massive, immobile crystal, capable of blending into its environment when motionless.
memorable: It can petrify opponents and unleash devastating psychic bursts, making it a formidable foe.
goals: To dominate the battlefield with psychic abilities and manipulate the minds of its opponents.
relations: Often encountered with other aberrations or psionic creatures.
environment: Typically found in mystical or otherworldly locations.
strengths: Immunities to various effects and damage types, strong psionic abilities, and legendary actions.
weaknesses: Lack of mobility may hinder its tactical options in combat.
attacks: Performs slam attacks and ranged mind spear attacks, capable of dealing bludgeoning and psychic damage, respectively.
most_powerful_ability: Psychic Burst, which stuns enemies in a cone and deals significant psychic damage.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 120 feet, allowing perception without sight.
skills: Highly skilled in arcana, history, nature, insight, and perception, showing great knowledge and awareness.
additional_information: False Appearance allows it to blend in as a giant crystal while immobile.
Magic Resistance provides advantage against spells and magical effects.
Powerful Mind grants advantage on Intelligence saving throws and ability checks.
Can innately cast various psionic spells without components.
Long-range teleportation capability to reposition in combat.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting includes abilities like detect magic, dominate person, and telekinesis.
test_queries: psychic creature with devastating burst attack
